query.name: findByPK
query.sql: SELECT * FROM ITEM WHERE ITEM_ID = ?

query.name: findItemByOid
query.sql: SELECT * FROM ITEM WHERE OC_OID = ?

query.name: findAll
query.sql: SELECT * FROM ITEM

query.name: create
query.sql: INSERT INTO ITEM (NAME, DESCRIPTION, UNITS, PHI_STATUS, ITEM_DATA_TYPE_ID, ITEM_REFERENCE_TYPE_ID, STATUS_ID, OWNER_ID, DATE_CREATED) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,NOW())

query.name: update
query.sql: UPDATE ITEM SET NAME=?,DESCRIPTION=?,UNITS=?, PHI_STATUS=?,ITEM_DATA_TYPE_ID=?,ITEM_REFERENCE_TYPE_ID=?,STATUS_ID=?, DATE_UPDATED=NOW(),UPDATE_ID=? WHERE ITEM_ID=?

query.name: findByName
query.sql: select * from item where name=?

query.name: findByNameAndCRFId
query.sql: select distinct i.* from item i, item_form_metadata ifm,crf_version c where i.name=? and i.item_id= ifm.item_id and ifm.crf_version_id=c.crf_version_id and c.crf_id=?

query.name: findAllNonRepeatingParentsBySectionId
query.sql: SELECT i.*, m.crf_version_id FROM item i, item_form_metadata m , item_group ig, item_group_metadata igm ,section s WHERE i.item_id = m.item_id AND (m.parent_id = 0 or m.parent_id is null) AND m.section_id = ? and igm.crf_version_id=s.crf_version_id and ig.item_group_id = igm.item_group_id and s.section_id = m.section_id and m.item_id = igm.item_id and igm.repeating_group != true

query.name: findAllParentsBySectionId
query.sql: SELECT i.* FROM item i, item_form_metadata m WHERE i.item_id = m.item_id AND (m.parent_id = 0 or m.parent_id is null) AND m.section_id = ?

query.name: findAllBySectionId
query.sql: SELECT i.* FROM item i, item_form_metadata m WHERE i.item_id = m.item_id AND m.section_id = ? order by i.item_id

query.name: findAllBySectionIdOrderedByItemFormMetadataOrdinal
query.sql: SELECT i.* , ifm.ordinal FROM item i, item_form_metadata ifm WHERE i.item_id = ifm.item_id AND ifm.section_id = ? order by ifm.ordinal

query.name: findAllUngroupedParentsBySectionId
query.sql: SELECT DISTINCT i.* FROM item i, item_form_metadata m, item_group ig, item_group_metadata igm WHERE i.item_id = m.item_id AND (m.parent_id = 0 or m.parent_id is null) AND m.section_id = ? AND (i.item_id=igm.item_id) AND igm.crf_version_id=? AND (ig.item_group_id=igm.item_group_id) AND (ig.name='Ungrouped' or ig.name='')

query.name: findAllByParentIdAndCRFVersionId
query.sql: SELECT i.* FROM item i, item_form_metadata m WHERE i.item_id = m.item_id AND m.parent_id = ? AND m.crf_version_id = ? ORDER BY m.column_number ASC

query.name: findAllItemsByVersionId
query.sql: select distinct i.* from versioning_map v, item i where v.item_id =i.item_id and v.crf_version_id=? order by i.item_id

query.name: findAllItemsByLayoutId
query.sql: select distinct i.* from versioning_map v, item i where v.item_id =i.item_id and v.form_layout_id=? order by i.item_id

query.name: findAllVersionsByItemId
query.sql: select crf_version_id from versioning_map where item_id=?

query.name: findAllActiveByCRF
query.sql: select i.*, cv.crf_version_id, cv.name as cvname from item i, item_form_metadata ifm, crf_version cv where i.item_id=ifm.item_id and cv.crf_version_id = ifm.crf_version_id and i.status_id=1 and cv.crf_id=? order by i.item_id

query.name: findAllItemsByGroupId
query.sql: select distinct i.* from item i, item_group fg, item_group_metadata fgim where fg.item_group_id=? and fg.item_group_id=fgim.item_group_id and fgim.crf_version_id=? and fgim.item_id=i.item_id

query.name: findAllItemsByGroupIdOrdered
query.sql: select distinct i.* from item i, item_group fg, item_group_metadata fgim where fg.item_group_id=? and fg.item_group_id=fgim.item_group_id and fgim.crf_version_id=? and fgim.item_id=i.item_id order by i.item_id

query.name: findAllItemsByGroupIdAndSectionIdOrdered
query.sql: select distinct i.* , ifm.ordinal from item i, item_group ig, item_group_metadata igm, item_form_metadata ifm where ig.item_group_id=? and ifm.section_id=? and ig.item_group_id=igm.item_group_id and igm.crf_version_id=? and igm.item_id=i.item_id and ifm.item_id =i.item_id order by ifm.ordinal

query.name: findAllItemsByGroupIdForPrint
query.sql: select distinct i.* from item i, item_group fg, item_group_metadata fgim,item_form_metadata ifm where fg.item_group_id=? and fg.item_group_id=fgim.item_group_id and fgim.crf_version_id=? and fgim.item_id=i.item_id and ifm.item_id = i.item_id and ifm.section_id=?

query.name: findItemByGroupIdandItemOid
query.sql: select distinct i.* from item i, item_group fg, item_group_metadata fgim where fg.item_group_id=? and fg.item_group_id=fgim.item_group_id and fgim.item_id=i.item_id and i.oc_oid=?

query.name: findAllRequiredByCRFVersionId
query.sql: select count(i.*) as number from item i, item_form_metadata ifm where i.item_id = ifm.item_id and ifm.crf_version_id=? and ifm.required=true

query.name: findAllRequiredBySectionId
query.sql: SELECT i.* FROM item i, item_form_metadata m WHERE i.item_id = m.item_id AND m.section_id =? and m.required =true

query.name: findIdAndNamesInSection
query.sql: select item.item_id, item.name from item_form_metadata ifm, item where section_id = ? and ifm.item_id = item.item_id

query.name: findChildAndParentNamesInSection
query.sql: select item.name, item.item_id, pn.parent_name, pn.parent_id from item_form_metadata ifm, item, (select item.name as parent_name, item_id as parent_id from item where item_id in ( select ifm.parent_id from item_form_metadata ifm where section_id = ? and parent_id > 0) )as pn where section_id = ? and ifm.parent_id > 0 and ifm.item_id = item.item_id and ifm.parent_id = pn.parent_id

query.name: getCountofItems
query.sql: select count(item.item_id) from item where item.status_id != 5

query.name: findAllWithItemDataByFormLayoutId
query.sql: select name, ordinal, oc_oid, item_data_id, i.item_id as item_id, value from item_data id, item i,versioning_map v where v.item_id =i.item_id and v.form_layout_id=? and id.item_id=i.item_id and event_crf_id = ? order by i.item_id,ordinal;

query.name: findAllWithItemGroupCRFVersionMetadataByCRFId
query.sql: select distinct item.name as item_name, item_group.name as group_name, item_group.oc_oid as group_oid , crf_version.name as version_name, crf_version.status_id as v_status from item, item_group , item_group_metadata, crf_version where item.item_id= item_group_metadata.item_id and item_group_metadata.item_group_id = item_group.item_group_id and item_group_metadata.crf_version_id = crf_version.crf_version_id and item_group.crf_id =(select crf_id from CRF where name=?) order by item.name;

query.name: findAllWithItemDetailsGroupCRFVersionMetadataByCRFId
query.sql: select distinct item.name as item_name, item.description as description, item.item_id as item_id, item.item_data_type_id as data_type, item.oc_oid as item_oid, item_group.name as group_name, item_group.oc_oid as group_oid , crf_version.name as version_name, crf_version.status_id as v_status from item, item_group , item_group_metadata, crf_version where item.item_id= item_group_metadata.item_id and item_group_metadata.item_group_id = item_group.item_group_id and item_group_metadata.crf_version_id = crf_version.crf_version_id and item_group.crf_id =(select crf_id from CRF where name=?) order by item.name;
